string.text: {=CSAnopeyText1}You want to hear a story? I got tales to tell! Sit down and listen.
{=CSAnopeyText2}Have you heard of the bug fixing wars of the past? No?
{=CSAnopeyText3}Well, I was there when it happened. Cruel times!
{=CSAnopeyText4}But I survived and fought every day against uneven odds.
{=CSAnopeyText7}You seem like you need some assistance for your project. Let me aid you!
{=CSPhillusText1}You better not be a manhunter, though.
{=CSPhillusText2}I split skulls ever since I've been born!
{=CSPhillusText3}If you think you are smarter than me, you are wrong. I outsmarted pigs when I was a child!
{=CSPhillusText4}I have drunk from many skulls and I will drink from many more. So do not stand in my way when I find a nice head on my next preys shoulder.
{=CSPhillusText5}You seem like a funny one. Want to come with me?
{=CSPhillusText6}You know I think gotta go. Farewell!
